episodes.title: 14 - Gaslight, Gatekeep, Get Shunned (w/ Helen Holmes)
episodes.description:
This week on Reality Bombshell, we’re going back to Breaking Amish Season 1. As a group of young Amish and Mennonite adults explored the world of the “English,” viewers were treated to a mess of cult indoctrination, emotional manipulation, and barely hidden producer interference.

At the center of it all are Jeremiah and Sabrina. They gaslit the cast, the crew, and the audience — concocting stories, drinking too much, and blowing up everything in their path. We unpack how their chaos didn’t just stir up drama, it splintered the entire cast.

Were they breaking Amish, or just breaking tradition? Either way, it’s one of the messiest reality TV experiments of the 2010s.

Have a case or anything else reality TV related you want to hear us cover? Reach out to us at realitybombshell@gmail.com.

Follow us @realitybombshell on all social media platforms. Linktr.ee/realitybombshell
